title: upset
body: cant even play anymore it says unable to connect to pvp.net server....very irritating ....bout to uninstall

replies.body:
PvP.net connection errors pop up when there's an unstable connection between your PC and the servers. While there are a lot of causes, our [connection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)goes over the most frequent fixes for this.

If you still have issues after working through that guide, please let me know.
